# XALD Project: Study age-related DNA methylation changes in X-linked Adrenoleukodystrophy (XALD)  

This report focusses on the following questions:

1. Are there age-related methylation changes associated with XALD and do XALD patients show accelarated aging compared to controls ?

2. Which DNA methylation changes are associated with XALD ?
